Package game

Class GameLevel

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.World
game.GameLevel
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.CollisionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.util.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelOne, LevelThree, LevelTwo
public abstract class GameLevel
extends city.cs.engine.World
implements city.cs.engine.CollisionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener
The base class for all levels in the game. The objects common to all levels are generated by this class.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.awt.Image background
    The image specific to any given level
    protected Game game
    Game reference used to change levels
    protected city.cs.engine.StaticBody ground
    A static body that Sunmi runs on shared by all levels
    protected HeliDropper heliDropper
    Reference to the specific heli dropper
    protected LevelType levelType
    Used to determine what the current level is
    protected city.cs.engine.SoundClip splat
    Used in every level when a falling generic character (hater or supporter) hits the ground

    Fields inherited from class city.cs.engine.World

    DEFAULT_GRAVITY, version

  • Constructor Details

    • GameLevel

      public GameLevel​(Game game)
      The only constructor for the GameLevel class. It takes as its only argument a Game reference.
      Parameters:
      game - reference to Game Object so that we can call Game methods to change the level.

  • Method Details

    • isComplete

      public abstract boolean isComplete()
      Abstract method needed to be implemented in sub-classes
      Returns:
      true when the conditions are met to go to the next level

    • getBackgroundImage

      public abstract java.awt.Image getBackgroundImage()
      Abstract method needed to get the background image for the current level
      Returns:
      a background image

    • getLevelType

      public LevelType getLevelType()
      Public method used to determine the value of the Level Type enum specific to the current level
      Returns:
      the current level's Level Type object value

    • stopBackgroundMusic

      public abstract void stopBackgroundMusic()
      Abstract void that stops the currently playing background music in the specific level

    • dropSpecificCharacter

      public void dropSpecificCharacter​(java.lang.String name, org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 pos, float gravityScale)
      drop a specific generic character into the field of view
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the character
      pos - the character's position
      gravityScale - the character's force of gravity

    • setSunmiPosition

      public abstract void setSunmiPosition​(org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 position, java.lang.String direction)
      Change Sunmi's position and direction
      Parameters:
      position - Sunmi's new position
      direction - Sunmi's new direction
